channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] VCF as a Service - Virtual Data Center (vmware.vdc) has changed the description of the plan named vdc-paid
item.description: *before*: Virtual Data Center Paid Plan Used by Single Tenant Virtual Data Centers, *after*: Virtual Data Center Paid Plan Used by Single Tenant Virtual Data Centers
